External headers:
- Glew 1.2.4 (http://glew.sourceforge.net)
- Lua 5.1 work3 (http://www.lua.org)
- TinyXML v2.3.2 (http://www.grinninglizard.com/tinyxml)
- zlib v1.2.2 (http://www.zlib.net)
- libpng v1.2.8 (http://www.libpng.org)
- jpeg v6b (http://www.ijg.net)

Normally, you don't need to include these headers in your own project. They are primarily for internal use of garnet library. But sometimes, you may want to use functionalities of those libraries,
